title: Charge-Bound Warhammer
content: Charge-Bound Warhammer Rare 2~11 Damage Versatile - Wielding With Both Hands 1d10 (1d8)+1 Bludgeoning This hammer's magical powers only function if it's Bound to an Eldritch Knight or is a Warlock's Pact Weapon. Favoured Weapon: This weapon has a +1 bonus to damage and attack rolls. Shocking Bound: This weapon deals an additional 1~6 Lightning damage. Weapon Enchantment +1 Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks: Energy crackles in weird and wonderful patterns across your hand as you wield thi
